Reading and Math are not sufficient anymore.

Every child should have the opportunity to learn how computers do their magic.

New Class Starting Sunday: Oct 6, 2013

Time: Sundays 2:00 to 4:00 pm

Duration: 8 weeks

Location: Room: GRW 120 in the Library. Directions

The kids will learn basic concepts of programming and how the computer works. They'll build a tic-tac-toe game, draw simple animations and pictures.

We will use publicly available lessons which will allow the students to experiment on their own. Khan Academy, Code Academy and CodeHS are some of the sites we will use. We will also use some of our own lessons.

Week 1 - Oct 6, 2013

Introduction and Syllabus

Khan Aacademy

Titan Pad

KidsOnKode is a registered non-profit organization in Oregon, USA
